chicken

Description

The CHICKEN Scheme system

Author

felix

Version

  • 2.41 release version
  • 2.325 install step is done via process-execute to allow replacement of running chicken-setup instance
  • 2.321 IEEE float constant fix
  • 2.320 Removed MSVC support, better prefix handling
  • 2.319 Some changes and a fix in the setup script again [Thanks to John Cowan again]
  • 2.318 Fix in setup script [Thanks to John Cowan]
  • 2.317 Initial release as egg

Download

chicken.egg

Documentation

This extension packages the newest development snapshot of the CHICKEN base system as an egg.

When installed via chicken-setup, the development snapshot will be configured, built and installed with the same settings as the previously installed (the current) version of CHICKEN. To pass extra options to configure, invoke chicken-setup with the configuration options following --, like this: 

% chicken-setup chicken -- --without-XYZ ...

You will need autoconf, automake and libtool.
